verses.content: Chun, Solomon chun LALPA in le lal in a bâwl a, Solomon chun a tum po po hrâttaka a thaw zo vawng hnung chun,
Gibeon khuoa a kuoma ân lâr ang khan LALPA chu Solomon kuomah a hung inlâr nâwk a.

Chun, LALPA chun a kuomah, “I ṭawngṭaina le i hnina ka hmaa i hung intlunhai kha ka lo ngai a, hi in i bâwl hi kumkhuoa ka hming inumtirna dingin ka sukthieng tah; ka mit le ka lungril chu chutaka chun kumkhuoin um tâng a tih.
Chun, nang khawm hi thu ka pêk ang taphawt chea thaw dinga i pa David um anga lungril ṭhatak put le lungril indiktak puta ka mithmua i uma, ka thuruothai le ka rorêlhai i pawm zing chun.
Israelhai chunga hin i ram lalṭhungpha chu kumkhuoa dingin suknghet ka tih, i pa David kuoma, ‘Israelhai lalṭhungphaa ṭhung ding tlasam naw ti nih,’ tia ka lo tiem ta ang khan.

Amiruokchu, nangniin amanih, in thlahaiin amanih in mi zui chu in mi kîrsan a, ka thupêkhai le ka thu- ruothai kân hriettirhai cheu hi in pawm nawh a, pathien danghai rawng dâm in va bâwl a, in va biek chun,

Israelhai hi ram ka pêka inthawk hin sukbohmang ka ta; chun, hi in ka hming dinga ka sukthieng ta sa hi ka mithmu phâk nawah sawnhmang dai ka tih; chuongchun, Israelhai hi hnam tinrênghai laia chun tielna le a se tieng hrilkhinaa hmang la nîng an ta;
chun, hi in hi insâng hle sienkhawm, a fe khêl taphawthai chun maktiin lân hui an ta, ‘Ieng- dinga LALPAIN hi ram le hi in hi hieng ang lâwma a thaw am a na?’ la tîng an tih.

Chun, mihaiin, ‘LALPA an Pathien, an puhai Aigupta rama inthawka ṭhuoi suoktu kha an mâksan a, pathien danghai an chel a, an biek a, an rawnghai an bâwl ta lei a nih; chuleiin, LALPAIN hieng sietna po po hi an chungah a hung intlungtir tah a ni hi,’ tiin la dawn an tih,” a ta.
Chun, Solomon chun in pahni, LALPA in le lal in a bâwl sûng, kum sâwmhni an vawi hnungin
(Tura lal Hiram chun Solomon chu sidar thinghai, fâr thinghai, rângkachakhai a mamaw taphawt a tum vawng a na,) lal Solomon chun Hiram chu Galili rama khaw sâwm- hni a pêk a.
Chun, Hiram chu Turaa in- thawk chun Solomonin khuo a pêkhai chu en dingin a suok a, a ditzâwng a ni naw hleh a.
Chun, ama chun, “Ka unaupa, hieng i khaw mi pêkhai hi ieng khuo am an ni tâwl leh?” a ta. Chuong- chun, tu chen hin Kabul ram an ti tah a nih.
Chun, Hiram chun lal chu râng- kachak talent za le sâwmhni a thawn a.

Lal Solomonin sinthawa ruoi lui pâwl a siemna san chu hi hi a nih; LALPA in le ama in bâwltu ding le, Millo dâm, Jerusalem kul dâm, Hazor khuo dâm, Megiddo khuo dâm, Gezer khuo dâm siemtu dingin a nih.
Aigupta lal Pharao chu a hang feh a, Gezer khuo a hang lâk a, a rawh a, chu khuoa um Kanaan mihai chu a that a, a naunu Solomon nuhmei chu thuom thilpêka a lo pêk tah a nih.
Chun, Solomon chun Gezer khuo dâm, Beth-horon khuo thlang hnung lem dâm,
Baalath khuo dâm, Israel rama thlalêr rama Tamar khuo dâm,

Solomonin thil siekhâwmna a nei khuo po po dâm, a tawlailîr siena khuo dâm, a sakawr chung chuong mihai siena khuohai dâm, Jerusalem khuoa dâm, Lebanona dâm, a rorêlna ram sûng po poa Solomonin ân hawi- tirna dinga siem a tumhai po po chu a lo siem tah a na.
Chun, Israel thlahai ni ve lo, Amor mihai, Hit mihai, Periz mihai, Jebus mihai a la um sunhai po po kha,
an thlahai chuong rama la um, Israel thlahaiin an sukbohmang vawng thei nawhai laia chun Solomonin siehlaw, sinthawa ruoi lui pâwl a siem a, tu chen hin a la nih.
Israel thlahai ruok chu Solomon chun chuong ang siehlawa chun a siem ve nawh a, indo mihai, a lusa- hai, a mi lienhai, a sipai hotuhai, a tawlailîr le a sakawr chung chuong mi hotuhai an ni lem a.
Chuonghai chu Solomona sin- thaw chunga hotu bîk, za nga le sâwm- nga, sinthaw vêngtuhai chu an nih.
Pharao naunu ruok chu David khawpuia inthawk chu ama in, Solomonin a bâwlpêka chun a hang fe tah a; chuongchun, Millo chu a bâwl tah a.

Chun, Solomon chun LALPA ta dinga maichâm a siema chun kum tin vawi thum pumrawhmang thilinhlân le, inremna thil inhlân ân hlân hlak a, LALPA hmaah maichâma chun riminhnikhai a raw sa bawk hlak a. Chuongchun, in chu a zo fel tah a.
Chun, lal Solomon chun Edom rama Tuipui Sen panga Eloth bula um Ezion-geber hmuna chun lawng ruol a siem a.
Chun, Hiram chun a siehlaw lawng mihai, tuisuorieta châng ṭhang, lawnga Solomon siehlawhai fepui dingin a tir a.
Chuonghai chu Ophira chun an va feh a, chutaka mi chu rângkachak talent za li le sâwmhni an hung phur a, lal Solomon kuoma chun an hung intlun a.
